title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7010.6 - Report concerning the condition of inmates kept apart from the general population
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7010.6 - Report concerning the condition of inmates kept apart from the general population

State Regulations

The report required by section 500-k and paragraph (d) of
subdivision (6) of section
137
of the

Correction Law concerning the condition of inmates kept apart from the general
population shall be submitted to the sheriff or, in local correctional
facilities not under the custody and control of the sheriff, to the

Commissioner of Correction or other person in charge of such
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7010.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
